headline: PTC’s Cloud and AI Bets in PLM Might Change The Case For Investing In PTC (PTC)
summary: Earlier this month, PTC announced that HOLON, a BENTELER Group subsidiary, adopted its Windchill+ cloud PLM to develop a Level-4 autonomous EV, while PTC also introduced an AI Engine for its Arena PLM and QMS platform to automate document review, comparison, and compliance workflows. Together, these moves highlight how PTC is embedding cloud and AI into everyday product development, positioning its software as core infrastructure for manufacturers building complex, regulated products such as...
